headline.main: Journalists Often Seen by Leaders as 'Enemy of the People'
headline.print_headline: Journalists Often Seen by Leaders as 'Enemy of the People'

lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump's assertion that journalists are "the enemy of the people," with its dark echoes of Soviet dictator Josef Stalin, has reverberated through news organizations reporting from the White House and far beyond.
snippet: President Donald Trump's assertion that journalists are "the enemy of the people," with its dark echoes of Soviet dictator Josef Stalin, has reverberated through news organizations reporting from the White House and far beyond....
